website_summaries.verdict: A professional-grade air quality detector small enough for handheld use in a variety of environments.
pros: Calibrated to be used in many different environments such as the home, car, or outdoors
cons: Air quality readings are not as reliable as some other professional-level units

customer_reviews.title: Bought a new one, got a "slightly" used one...
customer_reviews.text: I received a used one. Scratches all over the place, this is incredibly ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Burebista Valahorum

customer_reviews.title: Great physical design but doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: You want to like this device. It has a great form factor, great construction and feel, but it just doesn't work well. The TVOC and HCHO levels constantly read high and very similiar numbers regardless of building and even indoors vs outdoors. The temperature reading takes about 30-90 minutes to stablize and read correctly when changing between enivornments. AQI is hard to believe as it never changes outside of the 0 to 5 range, whether out in a field or in the middle of a city.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: A Better Choice
customer_reviews.text: I have cycled through some of the cheaper air monitors on Amazon. I have found this one to be the most well made and consistent in readings.
customer_reviews.author: Marko

customer_reviews.title: Was never accurate, then completely bricked after only 1 week of use.
customer_reviews.text: This product was never accurate, and then it completely stopped working. It took it out on a polluted day where other sensors in the area showed consensus that the AQI was around 275. This device maxed out, reading 999. Then, after about a week of use, it became completely bricked and could not turn on, just displayed a frozen white screen.
customer_reviews.author: dbgp66

customer_reviews.title: Unable to reach customer service or sales..
customer_reviews.text: Negatives: 1. Unable to reach either sales or customer service to gain assistance with a problem. 2. Temperature & humidity display appears fuzzy; 3. humidy reading was far lower than the readings of two dedicated humidy detectors. Could not assess the accuracy of the air quality readings. However, some were inconsistent within identical closed environments. Positives: Impressive build quality: looks & feels professional & main display is easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B.

customer_reviews.title: Descent Device with Some Design Flaws
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a few days now, and it seems to be working quite well. I don't have another meter to compare it to, but it reasonably matches the values from airnow.gov. The readout is clear and the user interface is intuitive. The most annoying thing about it is the position of the usb power socket. The device has a fold out stand on the back, but the power socket is on the bottom, so it won't stand up when plugged in. The stand even has a cutout for the cord to pass through, but can't be used when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't trust it for HCHO or VOC readings
customer_reviews.text: No way to calibrate so this unit may be reasonable for comparative measurements of locations, but I don't trust the absolute readings. Certainly not the HCHO and VOC readings as a glass of scotch placed next to the unit puts the Formaldehyde/HCHO readings thru the roof. EDIT: Reducing my feedback. After less than 30 days, the unit won't charge and won't turn on. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Rudolph Sternen

customer_reviews.title: Just got it, but its definitely not NEW
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical as a few other reviews mentioned receiving used items but got one anyway. I received it today and upon opening can see that it is clearly not a new item. The plastic cover is damaged from previous opening, the screen is scratched, funny that, the screen protector is stuck to the other side of the device!!! And last but not least, there is no user manual. Oh, and the cable is clearly tied up by a most likely unhappy previous owner. You know how these things come all nice and neat when they are actually new, yeah well this one was kinda scrunched up in there. I will definitely be returning the item...
customer_reviews.author: Stevo

customer_reviews.title: Verified with a professional and it's very accurate
customer_reviews.text: We had our older home tested for lead paint. While the guy was here he also tested air quality, since that's also part of his business, and we tested with our temtop meter. His $30k meter and our temtop meter matched very closely. Definitely worth the buy. He also said if you want a home air filter use one with carbon and hepa.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Thermometer inaccurate - unclear if others are, too
customer_reviews.text: Easy and intuitive to use, lightweight. The thermometer part of this is clearly inaccurate, off by more than 10 degrees at time - comparing to a dedicated room thermometer. This makes me doubt the accuracy of other measurements, including humidity. AQI seems directionally accurate - goes up in my kitchen when I’m cooking and down again once the windows are open and the rooms are ventilated. But without another reference, and again with the thermometer clearly being way off, hard to know how much to trust this.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: I WAS IMPRESSED ! ! On a hazmat team and we have instruments costing $100 and 1000's more.
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and easy to use. Fast calibration....understand the units sensitivity. And what its telling you...do not store in box or high volume voc areas. Very good tool for detecting particulates in the air. It is not chemical specific. Scale is small and unit saturated easily in contaminated areas. So this is very good for checking in normal environments ! I WAS IMPRESSED.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Must have for crawl space work
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by a friend, works great and I use it routinely to ensure I’m not in an unsafe breathing environment. When initially turned on in a space, it often says unsafe or unhealthy for 3-15 minutes but then levels out. I would rather a “calibrating” or “sampling” notice showed during this startup period, as it freaked me out at first.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey C. Quanrud

customer_reviews.title: Not as impressed as I thought I would be
customer_reviews.text: Overall I gave the Temtop LKC-1000S+ Air Quality Monitor 3 stars mainly due to tech support. The Temtop I thought was reasonably priced and easy to use out of the box. As far as accuracy, I have nothing to compare the "readings" against. My main concern is that the monitor reads TVOC or total voc's . However I was unable to determine what VOC's were being read to determine TVOC. My assumption is and I may be wrong is that TVOC is the sum or the adding of multiple VOC's together . If this is the case, then what individual VOC's(names) are being calculated to determine the TVOC???
customer_reviews.author: J. Michael Radell

customer_reviews.title: Good Meter But Very Technical & Somewhat Delicate
customer_reviews.text: The meter is easy to use but you need to read the instructions carefully. I think you can ruin it if you aren't careful. Not cheap. Readings in my car after 100 miles of driving were very interesting. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I can smell achemicals coming off my computer or monitor but this meter always reads "safe" with no heightened readings of any kind. It reads low everywhere else in the house as well even where I can smell other chemicals. Useless meter, going to buy a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: A. Scientist

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, ergonomic, and easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few portable AIQ meters here on Amazon for up to $200 and this one was the clear winner. Good quality and easy to operate and much better even than the more expensive M2000 from the same company.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very Cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought an air filter and how do you know it's working if you do not have a meter? This really did the job. When the air pollution is high outside, closing the windows does not help at all. Get a filter and a meter.
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love it.  Works great.  Very helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I have allergic bronchitis. Knowing air quality is beneficial. It helps to decide whether it's okay to work out at the gym, for instance, and for children whether to stay indoors or go outside to play. Air quality should also be considered for joggers, cyclists and the like.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product - Very Accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and easy to use. Really helped identify hot spots in the house and at work.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful device
customer_reviews.text: actually have tested it in various situations. smoke was coming into the house one day from a camp fire and the air quality meter picked it up. i put on my air filter and AQ got much better. was great to know that the filter actually does something. spray cleaner around the house and watch the VOCs jump. heat indicator is way off though.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Good so far
customer_reviews.text: Using the LKC-1000S+ to check air quality impact from nearby wildfire smoke. It appears to be accurate and well made, however the UI is lacking in customization features or ability to scale graphs over time.
customer_reviews.author: Ty Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this Air Monitor, and the customer service is beyond amazing! I had a lot of questions and they answered all my questions promptly and thoroughly - they really know their stuff! I use this monitor to test the air inside and outside and really appreciate the peace of mind it gives me, and it's really fun! I'd recommend it to any health-conscious individual who is curious about the environment he/she lives in. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: quickly boots up and seems to be accurate. Must reboot after a few minutes to obtain frequent readings.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: manual
customer_reviews.text: Found the tiny manual under the plastic in the box, its really light for a technical device, and the manufacturer manual page is not on their server
customer_reviews.author: M.M.

customer_reviews.title: It's not always accurate
customer_reviews.text: It's been a few months now and it's not as accurate as when I first got it. It gets stuck and has to be turned off and on to be reset
customer_reviews.author: Shay Shay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quality of this tool. Good battery life, great displays and overall high quality feel to it. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brad W.

customer_reviews.title: My equipment is not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: The data shown are not reliable. It shows always zero. I’ve done the reset but nothing changed. I’m afraid I have to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice proposal but still not yet invented
customer_reviews.text: It coul be moren accurate. Thought I was getting the best air quality detector but I had to admit that I had to retire this new gadget....
customer_reviews.author: Calvin & Hobbes

customer_reviews.title: bad battery
customer_reviews.text: worked only 4 months and the battery can not be charged in full and now(9 months only), the battery is totally dead. So bad!!
customer_reviews.author: RY

customer_reviews.title: Build quality could use work.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, then the third time I pressed the power button, daamn thing didn't power on!
customer_reviews.author: teckforce

customer_reviews.title: Good info
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the accuracy but it read consistently and proved that we were having an off gassing issue with our mattress. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: rizenw

customer_reviews.title: pricey
customer_reviews.text: works well but it's overpriced. prob 85% profit margins on this. readings get thrown off if there's any mist or excess humidity.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is precise on its read. Helped me solve my wife's allergy issues through using the information it offered. I paired it with a air purifier and the read out changed dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Very  simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use our use this to check the air quality at my moms house
customer_reviews.author: Charles Roache

customer_reviews.title: Good air quality detector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product can figure out what air pollution we may exposed to
customer_reviews.author: Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Some of the readings seem to be estimated from other ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the readings seem to be estimated from other measurements. The ratio of the PM 2.5 /10 is always the same..... The Ratio of TVOC to HCHO is always the same... Couldn't get a straight answer on what is measures vs what it estimates.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: however this one in my opinion is the best one. Yes it should little cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I have seen many other devices in the online market, however this one in my opinion is the best one . Yes it should little cheaper. The quality is good . The screen display is great. I have the 1000 S model which comes with extra features.
customer_reviews.author: ABDULLA

product_meta.title: Temtop LKC-1000S+ Air Quality Monitor Formaldehyde Detector, Air Pollution Sensor, Humidity and Temperature Meter Tester with PM2.5/PM10/HCHO/AQI/Particles/TVOC VOC/Histogram
feature_bullets: The latest 9-IN-1 air quality detector measures PM2.5, PM10, particles, HCHO(formaldehyde), TVOC, AQI, temperature, humidity and histogram function.
The new histogram function can reflect the changes on PM2.5 directly for the latest 12 hours.

Temtop advanced third-generation laser particle sensor has a lifetime up to 20,000 hours. Combined with the unique particle swarm optimization algorithm, it makes particle measurement more accurate and stable.
The pre-calibrated electrochemical sensors will accurately capture formaldehyde molecules accompanied by the detection function covering a wide range of organic pollutants.
Large TFT screen and rich display make it clear and easy to read data, even with battery indicator light to help you check battery at any time. 24/7 US Technician Support via Email and Phone.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
